    • Method Detail

      • setApkDir

        public void setApkDir(java.lang.String apkDir)
        Customizing the directory for storing the APK files or DEX files. The name list of APK files under this directory will be detected by RAPID.
        Parameters:
        apkDir - the string of the full path.

      • setSingleApk

        public void setSingleApk(java.lang.String apkDir)
        Indicate a SINGLE APK or DEX file expected as the target sample file.
        Parameters:
        apkDir - Full path of the directory storing the target sample file.

      • setUnzippedFileDir

        public void setUnzippedFileDir(java.lang.String unzippedFileDir)
        If it is necessary for the user to create another directory to temporarily store the DEX file while it is processed, this method can help setting the directory
        Parameters:
        unzippedFileDir - The string for the full path of the directory

      • getApkList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> getApkList()
        Obtain a list of APK files detected in a specified directory.
        Returns:
        Null or an array list of the APK files' 'File object'.

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(QueryBlock queryBlock)
        A 'call back' method where RAPID can receive the APIs. User has to call this method. The parameter should be an implementation for interface: 'QueryBlock', Also, function 'queries()'of the interface have to be overridden as an API container where user calls the RAPID APIs
        Parameters:
        queryBlock - the implementation of interface 'QueryBlock',

      • getInsInvokeMethods

        public java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> getInsInvokeMethods(MethodElement[] methods)
        Obtain the instructions if they invoked any one in a methods list.
        Parameters:
        methods - Target method array.
        Returns:
        Null or a list of instructions invoked the input methods.

      • getInsInvokeMethod

        public java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> getInsInvokeMethod(MethodElement method)
        Obtain the instructions that invoked a method.
        Parameters:
        method - Target methodElement object
        Returns:
        Null or a list of Instruction objects

      • getMethodInvolker

        public java.util.ArrayList<MethodElement> getMethodInvolker(MethodElement method)
        Obtain the methods including a certain function call.
        Parameters:
        method - An object of MethodElement wanted to be searched.
        Returns:
        Null or an array list of methods that containing the instruction(s) that invoked the method in the parameter.

      • doseMethodExist

        public boolean doseMethodExist(MethodElement method)
        Return true or false for the existence of a method in DEX file, This function FULLY compares the 'attributes' of the method: 'className', 'methodName', and 'parameterType[]',which are the 3 essential conditions
        Parameters:
        method - Target method (an methodElement object).
        Returns:
        True if the method is existed in DEX file.

      • searchMethod

        public java.util.ArrayList<MethodElement> searchMethod(MethodElement method)
        Search method(s) in DEX file with the same fields that are not Null in the target method. If an unique method is expected as the result, the target method should provide no null within fields: 'className', 'methodName', and 'parameterType[]'. If all attributes are NULL, the return is the whole list of methods.
        Parameters:
        method - Target method (methodElement object).
        Returns:
        A list of method(s) (methodElement object).

      • doseStringExist

        public boolean doseStringExist(java.lang.String keyword)
        Return True if a string can fully match a string parsed from DEX file
        Parameters:
        keyword - The string wanted to be searched
        Returns:
        True if it exists.

      • searchString

        public StringElement searchString(java.lang.String stringContent)
        Search a string in DEX file.
        Parameters:
        stringContent - string for searching.
        Returns:
        a list of matched string (stringElements object).

      • searchStringContaines

        public java.util.ArrayList<StringElement> searchStringContaines(java.lang.String keyword)
        Search string(s) in DEX file that contains the input string.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Target string.
        Returns:
        An array list of eligible string(s) (stringElement object).

      • getMethodList

        public java.util.ArrayList<MethodElement> getMethodList()
        Obtain a list of method objects parsed out of a DEX file.
        Returns:
        Null or an array list of 'MethodElement' objects. The list includes methods with a definition and a code block and methods without those, which is also considered as an API in RAPID.

      • getStringList

        public java.util.ArrayList<StringElement> getStringList()
        Obtaining the strings parsed out of a DEX file
        Returns:
        Null or an array list of 'StringElement' objects. 'String' objects here represent all strings that exist in the application, e.g., values in string variables, method or class names, function return values etc.

      • getApiList

        public java.util.ArrayList<MethodElement> getApiList()
        Obtain a list of all utilized APIs in a DEX file. Term 'API' in RAPID represents all the methods utilized in a DEX file without a code block.
        Returns:
        Null or the array list where contains the 'MethodElement' instances of the eligible methods.

      • searchInstruction

        public java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> searchInstruction(java.lang.String opcode,
                                                 long operand)
        Search an instructions by matching the opcode and the operand.
        Parameters:
        opcode - the string type of opcode that one instruction must has.
        operand - the number of operand, sometimes referring to string id, method id or others depending on the type of operand.
        Returns:
        Null or the eligible list of instructions (Instruction objects).

      • searchInsWithOpc

        public java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> searchInsWithOpc(java.lang.String opcode)
        Search an instructions with same opcode
        Parameters:
        opcode - the string type of opcode
        Returns:
        The Null or the list of matched instructions (Instruction objects).

      • searchInstruction

        public java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> searchInstruction(Instruction[] targetIns)
        Search instructions of a DEX file in case they can match any one in an instruction list. Fields 'opcode' and 'operand' are checked maximum if the value of these two fields are not NULL.
        Parameters:
        targetIns - Target instruction list.
        Returns:
        NULL when there is no matching instructions or an instruction list (Instruction objects).

      • getClassList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getClassList()
        Obtain a list of class names in DEX file.
        Returns:
        Null or an array list of class names.

      • getCodeBlockList

        public java.util.ArrayList<CodeBlock> getCodeBlockList()

        Returns:
        Null or an array list of CodeBlock objects.

      • getCodeBlockById

        public CodeBlock getCodeBlockById(int methodId)
        Obtain the codeBlock of a method with certain method Id.
        Returns:
        Null or a codeBlock element.

      • getInsLoadExternalFiles

        public java.util.ArrayList<Instruction> getInsLoadExternalFiles()
        Obtain the instructions that invoked external files (JAR, DEX or SO).
        Returns:
        Null or an instruction(s) list that invoked the APIs below in a DEX file. java.lang.System.load(..) java.lang.System.loadLibrary(..) dalvik.system.DexClassLoader.DexClassLoader(..) dalvik.system.PathClassLoader.PathClassLoader(..)

      • getExternalFilesDirs

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String> getExternalFilesDirs()
        Obtain pairs of values 1. The address of the instructions for loading external files / libraries 2. The back-traced static value referring to the directory saving the external files.
        Returns:
        Map Long: static value; String: address of the instruction.

      • areExternalFilesloaded

        public boolean areExternalFilesloaded()
        Return true if any instruction called external files.
        Returns:
        Return TRUE if APIs below are invoked. java.lang.System.load(..) java.lang.System.loadLibrary(..) dalvik.system.DexClassLoader.DexClassLoader(..) dalvik.system.PathClassLoader.PathClassLoader(..)

      • doseApiExist

        Return true if an certain API is exist
        Parameters:
        api - An MethodElement object
        Returns:
        True if the API is exist

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the target method is invoked.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • searchInsWithString

        Search instructions by a stringElement. An overloaded method of function: searchInsWithString(String))
        Parameters:
        string - Target stringElement for searching
        Returns:
        Null or an array list of instructions related to the target string
